title: Unveiling photoinduced electron transfer in cobalt(III)-R-pyridine complexes anchored to anatase nanocrystals: photoluminescence and magnetic studies
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,17218-17233
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA02648A, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Ganeshraja Ayyakannu Sundaram, Krishnamoorthy Anbalagan, Mohammad Ahmad Wadaan, Jagan Rajamoni, Vaithinathan Karthikeyan
This article demonstrates the synthesis of mixed ligand complexes of cis-[Co(tn)2(Rpy)Br]Br2 via a mechanochemical approach. Their ferromagnetic properties and efficient electron transfer to Co(III) using TiO2 under UV light are confirmed.
